trans-unit.source: Enables the Web programming model for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務的 Web 程式設計模型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> behavior, when used in conjunction with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> binding, enables [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to expose and access Web style services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> 行為與 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> 繫結一起使用時，可讓 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 公開並存取 Web 樣式服務。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebServiceHost> automatically adds this behavior to endpoints that use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebServiceHost> 會將這個行為自動加入至使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> 的端點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 端點。

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters that support modifying the bindings.
trans-unit.target: 支援修改這些繫結的繫結參數。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint,System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)" /> method to pass data at runtime to bindings to support custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint,System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)" /> 方法，在執行階段將資料傳遞至繫結以支援自訂行為。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: The client runtime.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端執行階段。

trans-unit.source: Adds a client error inspector to the specified service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 將用戶端錯誤檢查加入至指定的服務端點。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 端點發送器。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to change the way errors that occur on the service are handled.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫此方法以變更處理服務發生錯誤的方式。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: 公開合約的端點。

trans-unit.source: The client to which the custom behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用自訂行為的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime)" /> method to support modification or extension of the client across an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime)" /> 方法，支援跨端點的用戶端修改與擴充。

trans-unit.source: As part of this method, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior.GetRequestClientFormatter%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior.GetReplyClientFormatter%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> are called for each operation to determine the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IClientMessageFormatter> to install.
trans-unit.target: 做為此方法的一部分，會對每個作業呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior.GetRequestClientFormatter%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior.GetReplyClientFormatter%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>，以判斷要安裝的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IClientMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: 公開合約的端點。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint dispatcher to which the behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用行為的端點發送器。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher)" /> method to support modification or extension of the client across an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher)" /> 方法，支援跨端點的用戶端修改與擴充。

trans-unit.source: As part of this method, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior.GetRequestDispatchFormatter%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior.GetReplyDispatchFormatter%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> are called for each operation to determine the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter> to install.
trans-unit.target: 做為此方法的一部分，會對每個作業呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior.GetRequestDispatchFormatter%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior.GetReplyDispatchFormatter%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>，以判斷要安裝的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if automatic format selection is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會判斷是否啟用自動格式選取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if automatic format selection is enabled; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用自動格式選取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] automatic format selection, see [WCF Web HTTP Formatting](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-formatting.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 自動格式選取範圍，請參閱[WCF Web HTTP 格式化](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-formatting.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the default message body style.
trans-unit.target: 取得及設定預設的訊息本文樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the values defined in the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle" /> 列舉型別中定義的一個值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute> does not explicitly set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute.BodyStyle%2A> property, the value of this property is used as the body style for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute> 沒有明確設定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute.BodyStyle%2A> 屬性，則會將此屬性的值用做作業的本文樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.Bare>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.Bare>。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the default outgoing request format.
trans-unit.target: 取得及設定預設的傳出要求格式。

trans-unit.source: One of the values defined in the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat" /> 列舉型別中定義的一個值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute> does not explicitly set the `OutgoingRequestFormat` property, the value of this property is used as the request format for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute> 沒有明確設定 `OutgoingRequestFormat` 屬性，則會將此屬性的值用做作業的要求格式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat.Xml>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat.Xml>。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the default outgoing response format.
trans-unit.target: 取得和設定預設的傳出回應格式。

trans-unit.source: One of the values defined in the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat" /> 列舉型別中定義的一個值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute> does not explicitly set the `OutgoingResponseFormat` property, the value of this property is used as the response format for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute> 沒有明確設定 `OutgoingResponseFormat` 屬性，則會將此屬性的值用做作業的回應格式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat.Xml>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat.Xml>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，指定內部伺服器錯誤 (HTTP 狀態碼：500) 發生時，是否產生 FaultException。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用旗標，會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: 公開合約的端點。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.WebHttpDispatchOperationSelector" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.WebHttpDispatchOperationSelector" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.WebHttpDispatchOperationSelector" /> that contains the operation selector for the specified endpoint.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.WebHttpDispatchOperationSelector" /> 的執行個體，其中包含指定之端點的作業選取器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.WebHttpDispatchOperationSelector> maps calls to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service operations based on the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) suffix and the HTTP method used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.WebHttpDispatchOperationSelector> 會根據使用的統一資源識別項 (URI) 尾碼和 HTTP 方法，將呼叫對應至 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服務作業。

trans-unit.source: This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.WebHttpDispatchOperationSelector> that maps the incoming HTTP request to a service operation.
trans-unit.target: 這是衍生行為可使用的擴充點，可以用來提供本身的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.WebHttpDispatchOperationSelector> 實作，而該實作會將傳入 HTTP 要求對應至服務作業。

trans-unit.source: The service operation.
trans-unit.target: 服務作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets the query string converter.
trans-unit.target: 取得查詢字串轉換器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.QueryStringConverter" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.QueryStringConverter" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.QueryStringConverter> that can convert the service operation parameter types to and from the HTTP request URL's query string.
trans-unit.target: 這是衍生行為可使用的擴充點，可以用來提供本身的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.QueryStringConverter> 實作，而該實作可以來回轉換服務作業的參數型別和 HTTP 要求 URL 的查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: The service operation.
trans-unit.target: 服務作業。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the reply formatter on the client for the specified endpoint and service operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之端點和服務作業在用戶端上的回覆格式器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IClientMessageFormatter" /> reference to the reply formatter on the client for the specified operation and endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 對指定之作業和端點於用戶端上的回覆格式器的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IClientMessageFormatter" /> 參考。

trans-unit.source: This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IClientMessageFormatter> that is called to deserialize the response message into the out parameters/return value of the service operation.
trans-unit.target: 這是衍生行為可使用的擴充點，可以用來提供本身的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IClientMessageFormatter> 實作，而呼叫此實作即可將回應訊息還原序列化為服務作業的 out 參數/傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The service operation.
trans-unit.target: 服務作業。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the reply formatter on the service for the specified endpoint and service operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之端點和服務作業在服務上的回覆格式器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter" /> reference to the reply formatter on the service for the specified operation and endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 對指定之作業和端點在服務上的回覆格式器的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter" /> 參考。

trans-unit.source: This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter> that is called to convert the return value/out parameters of the service operation to a response message.
trans-unit.target: 這是衍生行為可使用的擴充點，可以用來提供本身的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter> 實作，而呼叫此實作即可將服務作業的傳回值/out 參數轉換成回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: The service operation.
trans-unit.target: 服務作業。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the request formatter on the client for the specified service operation and endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之服務作業和端點在用戶端上的要求格式器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IClientMessageFormatter" /> reference to the request formatter on the client for the specified operation and endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 對指定之作業和端點在用戶端上的要求格式器的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IClientMessageFormatter" /> 參考。

trans-unit.source: This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IClientMessageFormatter> that is called to convert the input parameters of the service operation call to a request message.
trans-unit.target: 這是衍生行為可使用的擴充點，可以用來提供本身的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IClientMessageFormatter> 實作，而呼叫此實作即可將服務作業呼叫中的輸入參數轉換成要求訊息。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specified in the <xref:System.UriTemplate> of the service operation must be serialized to the `To` URI of the request message and other parameters must be serialized to the body of the request message.
trans-unit.target: 在服務作業之 <xref:System.UriTemplate> 中指定的參數必須序列化為要求訊息的 `To` URI，而其他參數則必須序列化為要求訊息的本文。

trans-unit.source: The service operation.
trans-unit.target: 服務作業。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the request formatter on the service for the given service operation and service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之服務作業和服務端點在服務上的要求格式器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter" /> reference to the request formatter on the service for the specified operation and endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 對指定之作業和端點在服務上的要求格式器的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter" /> 參考。

trans-unit.source: This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter> that is called to deserialize the input parameters of the service operation from the request message.
trans-unit.target: 這是衍生行為可使用的擴充點，可以用來提供本身的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter> 實作，而呼叫此實作即可從要求訊息中還原序列化服務作業的輸入參數。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specified in the <xref:System.UriTemplate> of the service operation must be deserialized from the `To` URI of the request message and other parameters must be deserialized from the body of the request message.
trans-unit.target: 在服務作業之 <xref:System.UriTemplate> 中指定的參數必須從要求訊息的 `To` URI 還原序列化，而其他參數則必須從要求訊息的本文還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] Help page is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會判斷是否已啟用 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 說明頁面。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]Help page is enabled; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 說明頁面，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] REST Help page, see [WCF Web HTTP Service Help Page](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-service-help-page.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] REST 說明頁面，請參閱[WCF Web HTTP 服務說明的網頁](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-service-help-page.md)。

trans-unit.source: To enable the helpEnabled attribute in a configuration file:
trans-unit.target: 若要在組態檔中啟用 helpEnabled 屬性：

trans-unit.source: To programmatically enable the HelpEnabled property:
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計的方式啟用 HelpEnabled 屬性：

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the JavaScript callback parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 JavaScript 回呼參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript callback parameter name.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript 回呼參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Confirms that the endpoint meets the requirements for the Web programming model.
trans-unit.target: 確認端點符合 Web 程式設計模型的需求。

trans-unit.source: Verifies the following:
trans-unit.target: 驗證下列各項：

trans-unit.source: The endpoint is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: 端點不是 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint uses the HTTP or HTTPS schemes.
trans-unit.target: 端點使用 HTTP 或 HTTPS 配置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> of the binding is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 繫結的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> 設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The binding contains an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement> where <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 繫結包含 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>，其中 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A> 已設定為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The parameters specified in the <xref:System.UriTemplate> must be part of the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.UriTemplate> 中指定的參數必須是作業的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Operations that specify <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.Bare> have, at most, one input parameter and can have no out parameters.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.Bare> 的作業最多有一個輸入參數，而且不能有任何 out 參數。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Ensures the binding is valid for use with the WCF Web Programming Model.
trans-unit.target: 確保繫結有效且可搭配 WCF Web 程式設計模型使用。
